sen.j: 京都市美術館（きょうとしびじゅつかん）は京都府京都市の岡崎公園にある美術館。
sen.e: Kyoto Municipal Museum of Art is an art museum located at Okazaki-koen Park of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Municipal Museum of Art is an art museum located at Okazaki-koen Park in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Municipal Museum of Art is an art museum located at Okazaki-koen Park in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It was opened in 1933.
It was opened in 1933.
It was opened in 1933.

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）に京都で行われた昭和天皇即位の礼を記念して計画が始まったため、当初は大礼記念京都美術館という名称であった。
sen.e: Its name was initially the Kyoto Enthronement Memorial Museum of Art, because its building plan started in commemoration of Showa Emperor's enthronement ceremony conducted in Kyoto in 1928.
Its name was initially the Kyoto Enthronement Memorial Museum of Art, because it was built in commemoration of Showa Emperor's enthronement ceremony conducted in Kyoto in 1928.
Its name was initially the Kyoto Enthronement Memorial Museum of Art, because it was built in commemoration of Emperor Showa's enthronement ceremony conducted in Kyoto in 1928.

sen.j: 本館の設計は前田健二郎。
sen.e: The main building was designed by Kenjiro MAEDA.
The main building was designed by Kenjiro MAEDA.
The main building was designed by Kenjiro MAEDA.

sen.j: 公立美術館としては東京都美術館に次ぎ日本で二番目。
sen.e: It was the second public art museum after Tokyo Metropolitan Art Museum.
It was the second public art museum in Japan after Tokyo Metropolitan Art Museum.
It was the second public art museum in Japan after Tokyo Metropolitan Art Museum.

sen.j: 東京都美術館同様に公募展の貸し会場となったほか、独自のコレクションを形成し常設展も開始した。
sen.e: It not only rented its space for public entry exhibitions but also started its permanent exhibition by forming its original collection.
It not only rented out space for publicly sponsored exhibitions but also started its own permanent exhibition by creating an original collection.
It not only rented out space for publicly sponsored exhibitions but also started its own permanent exhibition by creating an original collection.

sen.j: 2000年には公募展などの増加に対応するため、別館を開館している。
sen.e: In 2000, the Annex hall was opened.
In 2000, the Annex Hall was opened.
In 2000, the Annex Hall was opened for increasing exhibitions such as publicly sponsored ones.
sen.cmt: 訳を一部追加しました。

sen.j: コレクションは明治以降、1990年頃にまで至る日本画、洋画、工芸作品などが中心。
sen.e: Its collection encompasses mainly Japanese arts, Western arts, and craftworks from Meiji Period to 1990.
Its collection encompasses mainly Japanese art, Western art, and craftworks from the Meiji Period to 1990.
Its collection encompasses mainly Japanese art, Western art, and craftworks from the Meiji period to 1990.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。

sen.j: 主な展覧会はこれらコレクションを年数回テーマを変えて展示換えする常設展のほか、各種公募展、大学の卒業展など。
sen.e: Its main exhibitions are its permanent exhibitions which includes exhibits of several different themes from the permanent collection every year, various public entry exhibitions, and college graduation exhibitions.
Its main exhibitions are the exhibitions on several different themes every year selected from the permanent collection, various publicly sponsored exhibitions, and college graduation exhibitions.
sen.cmt: 「its permanent exhibitions which includes exhibits of」→「the exhibitions on」, 「every year」箇所異動
sen.e: Its main exhibitions are the exhibitions on several different themes every year selected from the permanent collection, various publicly sponsored exhibitions, and college graduation exhibitions.

sen.j: また、新聞社主催の大規模展覧会が集客の核になっている。
sen.e: Also, large scale exhibitions hosted by newspaper companies attract its most visitors.
But the most visitors are drawn to the large scale exhibitions hosted by newspaper companies.
But the most visitors are drawn to the large scale exhibitions hosted by newspaper companies.

sen.e: The Main Hall: designed by Kenjiro MAEDA, completed in 1993

sen.j: 別館（旧・京都市公会堂東館、京都会館別館） - （京都市建築課設計、1931年竣工）
sen.e: Annex (old Kyoto Municipal Auditorium East Hall, Annex of Kyoto Kaikan Hall): designed by the architectural office of Kyoto City, completed in 1931
sen.cmt: 旧・京都市公会堂東館→old Kyoto Municipal Auditorium East Hall[定訳不明]京都会館別館→Annex of Kyoto Kaikan Hall[定訳不明]京都市建築課→the architectural office of Kyoto City[定訳不明]別館が1931年竣工というのは，先の記述と矛盾します．ミスと思われますが，そのまま訳しました．

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄東西線東山駅下車徒歩10分
sen.e: Ten minute walk from the Tozai Line Higashiyama Station Kyoto City Subway.
It is a ten minute walk from Higashiyama Station on the Tozai Line of the Kyoto City Subway.
It is a ten minute walk from Higashiyama Station on the Tozai Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道、近畿日本鉄道京都駅から市バスで「京都会館美術館前」下車すぐ
sen.e: From JR Kyoto Station or Kintetsu Corporation Kyoto Station, take City Bus and get off at the 'Kyoto Kaikan Bijutsukan-mae' bus stop, which is very close to the museum.
From JR Kyoto Station or Kintetsu Corporation Kyoto Station, take the City Bus and get off at the 'Kyoto Kaikan Bijutsukan-mae' bus stop, which is very close to the museum.
